name: Pandy
description:
Play as Pandy, a cute panda who is trying to save his friend Drago from the darkness. Traverse through the levels, showing Drago what it means to be bright, but beware, the only way to help Drago was by tying yourself to him to save him.

This game was made entirely with Javascript, CSS and HTML without any engine or libraries ect.. so please try to excuse any buginess, and if it doesn't run extremely well optimised on your device, I apologise.

I hope you enjoy this brief game :]
